Abyss:BrokenCrystal.NAME: Broken Crystal
Abyss:BrokenCrystal.DESCRIPTION: When you draw this, randomize its cost and draw a card. NL Reduce regeneration of ALL enemies by !M!. NL Exhaust.

Abyss:Drained.NAME: Drained
Abyss:Drained.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, whenever a card is Exhausted, you take !M! damage.

Abyss:Staggered.NAME: Staggered
Abyss:Staggered.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, whenever you play an attack, shuffle a Wound into your discard pile.

Abyss:Withering.NAME: Withering
Abyss:Withering.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle a Burn into your discard pile.

Abyss:Panic.NAME: Panic
Abyss:Panic.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

Abyss:Tormented.NAME: Tormented
Abyss:Tormented.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! abyss:Abysstouched.

Abyss:HandOfTheAbyss.NAME: Hand of the Abyss
Abyss:HandOfTheAbyss.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! abyss:Abysstouched.

Abyss:Mineralized.NAME: Mineralized
Abyss:Mineralized.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this is Exhausted due to Ethereal, add a Dazed to your discard pile.
